title: General
fullText:
Socket-outlets shall be suitable for the intended application and shall comply with the appropriate Standard.
NOTES:
1 Socket-outlets complying with AS/NZS 3112 are suitable for general use in electrical installations.
2 Socket-outlets complying with AS/NZS 3123 are suitable for industrial applications.
3 Socket-outlets complying with AS/NZS 3131 are suitable for medical locations.
4 Socket-outlets complying with AS/NZS 60884.1 are suitable for general use in electrical installations.
5 Socket-outlets complying with AS/NZS 60884.2.5 are suitable for adaptors.
Socket-outlets shall be installed in accordance with Clauses 4.4.2 to 4.4.4.
Socket-outlets shall be installed in readily accessible positions.
NOTE: Socket-outlets installed in locations such as behind fixed furniture, in cupboards or in similar locations are not considered to be readily accessible.
Socket-outlets shall be installed so that the plug can be withdrawn without undue difficulty.
NOTE: Socket-outlets installed in locations such as behind fixed furniture, in cupboards or in similar locations are not considered to be readily accessible.
Socket-outlets shall be installed so that the plug can be withdrawn without undue difficulty.
